name: the_rising_sun_cafe
description: This is a Restaurant website that is built with React, Node, Express, MongoDB, and Bootstrap. It is a full-stack application that allows users to register, login, and order food. It also allows the admin to add, edit, and delete food items.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
